messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/10/03 6:05:21 PM Pacific Daylight Time, genant2@aol.com ... Hey Pam, Sorry I have not seen it, but would love to also. I checked my local
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/10/03 6:05:21 PM Pacific Daylight Time, genant2@...
writes:

> Has anyone here seen the documentary "Grown Without Schooling" about the
> homeschooled children as adults? Was just about to send in to buy the tape
>
> but thought I would see what others thought about it first.
>

Hey Pam,

Sorry I have not seen it, but would love to also. I checked my local library,
surrounding city libraries and both San Bernardino and Los Angeles county
libraries to no avail. Please let us know how you obtain it when you do.

Thanx in advance,
Rhonda


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.msgSnippet: Has anyone here seen the documentary Grown Without Schooling about the homeschooled children as adults?  Was just about to send in to buy the tape but
messages.messageBody:
Has anyone here seen the documentary "Grown Without Schooling" about the
homeschooled children as adults? Was just about to send in to buy the tape
but thought I would see what others thought about it first.
Pam G.
